title: Calling from the Galaxy
overview: At both ends of the Milky Way reside the Emperors of the North and South, masters of life and death for all beings. One day, amid a game of strategy, a wager is struck with "romance" as the stake, placing life and death at the mercy of heaven's trials. The Northern Dipper's Mystic Pearl descends to the mortal realm to endure three lifetimes of trials by love.
